## getTables

### Description:

The getTables method retrieves the names of all tables in the database.

### Usage:

```javascript
const db = new ArletDb('path/to/database', 'myDatabase');
db.getTables()
  .then(tables => console.log('Tables:', tables))
  .catch(err => console.error('Error:', err));
```
